help-file.title: "TRUE SEEING"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: Yes Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Divination
"True Seeing" grants the caster an increased perception. It combines the effects of "Detect Evil", "Detect Good", "Detect Magic", "Sense Life" and "Detect Invisibility".
